首先唔知大家有冇係 Twitter 睇過有個叫 Roger Wardell 嘅人嘅 Posts。


佢上年12月其實已經好細致咁講晒 Endgame 嘅大部份劇情，例如 Thor 變肥宅、美隊會講 Hail Hydra、Tony 嘅老豆同真人 Jarvis 會出場等等。係距離半年前已經講好晒好多嘅劇情位，所以有理由相信佢可能有份係 Marvel Studio 做。

https://mobile.twitter.com/rogerwardell

而4日（5月8日）前呢位 Twitter 係 Marvel 開始公開 Phase 4 時間表嘅時候又再 Post 嘢：

GOTG3
“Rocket's creator is the High Evolutionary, Drax is in for a big surprise when he discovers his daughter is alive. Rocket also gets a love interest in the form of Lylla. Nebula and Star Lord will grow into closer friends.”

似係幫 Starlord 同 Gamora 以外嘅角色補返 Backstory。

Doctor Strange 2
“Doctor Strange 2: 1980's Boogaloo. Tilda Swinton is in talks to return as the Ancient One. Jericho Drumm and Clea will make their MCU debuts, Clea will likely be portrayed by an Asian actress. Most importantly the gloves will be back!”

Plans for Thunderbolt!?
"Don't worry, Marvel still has big plans for Zemo, Ghost, Justin Hammer, General Ross, and the Abomimation. The Leader is being discussed to return as the main villain of Thunderbolts, which is being planned as a trilogy. "

呢個反而幾大驚喜。推斷 General Ross 因為 Infinity War 事件令到無人遵守 Sokovia Accords 嘅規矩（美隊當 Ross 冇到自己去 Wakanda 應戰、Warmachine 又主動忽視），存在感低嘅 Ross 搵返過去 MCU 嘅反派角色去組成 Tunderbolt，定位類似 DC 嘅 Suicide Squad 咁。令人期待嘅係漫畫設定 Ross 係會變成 Red Hulk。

Plans for Thunderbolt!?
"Don't worry, Marvel still has big plans for Zemo, Ghost, Justin Hammer, General Ross, and the Abomimation. The Leader is being discussed to return as the main villain of Thunderbolts, which is being planned as a trilogy. "
Ghost唔係醫翻好喇咩 定我記錯？
